text.section: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, a judge of the court may not act as an attorney at law in a civil or criminal matter during a term of office.

This section does not apply:
In Harford County;
In Montgomery County;
In Baltimore City, to a judge of the Court while practicing law before any court of the State except an orphans' court; or
In Prince George's County, Baltimore County, Calvert County, and Howard County, to a judge of the Court while practicing law in connection with a case that is:
Outside the jurisdiction of orphans' court; and
Unrelated to the administration of an estate or guardianship.
